metadata.title: CVE-2019-25162 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:i2c: Fix a potential use after freeFree the adap structure only after we are done using it.This patch just moves the put_device() down a bit to avoid theuse after free.[wsa: added comment to the code, added Fixes tag]

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
